TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ComponentTray extends System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl implements class System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider
Public Class ComponentTray Inherits ScrollableControl Implements IExtenderProvider

summary.span: 提供設計工具元件匣的行為。

span.span: Provides behavior for the component tray of a designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在元件匣代表不否則提供可見的介面在設計階段元件，並提供方法讓使用者存取和設定這些元件的屬性。The component tray represents components that do not otherwise provide a visible surface at design time and provides a way for users to access and set the properties of those components. 某些類型的元件，例如，可能沒有可以在設計階段檢視的使用者介面。Some types of components, such as a , may not have a user interface that can be viewed at design time. 這些元件通常會顯示在元件匣中的圖示來表示。These components are usually represented by icons that are shown in the component tray. 在元件匣是項目作用之後，在 [設計] 檢視模式中，[設計] 檢視視窗底部顯示的矩形區域。The component tray is a rectangular region displayed at the bottom of the design view window while in design view mode, once it is active. 元件匣會在設計檢視中會顯示在元件匣中的元件已加入到屬於目前文件之後。The component tray becomes active in design view after a component that is displayed in the component tray has been added to or is part of the current document.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified designer and service provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在元件匣監視元件的加入和移除，並顯示適當的使用者介面物件，以表示它所包含的元件。The component tray monitors component additions and removals and displays appropriate user interface objects to represent the components it contains.

span.span: Displays an error message to the user with information about the specified exception.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 當`disposing`參數為 true，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個參考。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在覆寫小心不要參考物件已處置過的早期呼叫中。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需有關和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
